itinerary.route: Falls Hut to Lake Mackenzie Hut
itinerary.mapNote: Spectacular hut above tarn. Fiordland view. Harris Saddle 1255m crossed. 1050m.
Road end on Milford Highway. Bus connection. 532m.

waypoints.name: Harris Saddle
waypoints.note: Route highpoint. Hollyford Valley and Tasman Sea panorama.

waypoints.name: Conical Hill
waypoints.note: Optional from Harris Saddle. 360° Fiordland and Southern Alps.

waypoints.name: Routeburn Falls
waypoints.note: Dramatic cascade above the hut. Short detour worth taking.

waypoints.name: Lake Mackenzie
waypoints.note: Glacial tarn below Emily Peak. One of NZ's finest hut settings.

waypoints.name: Milford Sound
waypoints.note: End destination post-trail. Mitre Peak 1692m. Fiord cruise.
